2025.title: Polars
2025.description: Lightning-fast DataFrame library written in Rust for efficient data manipulation in Python.

2025.title: DuckDB
2025.description: In-process SQL OLAP database optimized for analytical queries on local data files.

2025.title: LangChain
2025.description: Framework for developing data-aware and LLM-powered applications using Python.

2025.title: RAPIDS AI
2025.description: GPU-accelerated data science framework enabling pandas-like workflows on NVIDIA hardware.

2025.title: Databricks Lakehouse
2025.description: Unified platform combining data engineering, analytics, and machine learning in the cloud.

2025.title: Deepnote
2025.description: Collaborative notebook platform designed for data teams to share and build analyses together.

2025.title: Delta Lake
2025.description: Storage layer that brings ACID transactions to data lakes for reliable data engineering and analytics.

2025.title: Trino
2025.description: Distributed SQL query engine for running interactive analytic queries across data sources.

2025.title: ZenML
2025.description: MLOps framework that standardizes and automates reproducible ML pipelines.

2025.title: Flyte
2025.description: Cloud-native workflow automation platform for building scalable and maintainable ML pipelines.

2025.title: Pachyderm
2025.description: Data versioning and pipeline orchestration system that brings Git-like semantics to data.

2025.title: Kedro
2025.description: Opinionated, open-source Python framework for building robust data and ML pipelines.

2025.title: CausalML
2025.description: Libraries and tools for causal inference and uplift modeling used in data-driven decision making.

2025.title: Apache TVM
2025.description: End-to-end deep learning compiler stack for optimizing and deploying models on diverse hardware.

2025.title: OpenTelemetry
2025.description: Observability framework for collecting telemetry (metrics, logs, traces) from ML systems in production.

2025.title: Seldon Core
2025.description: Open-source platform for deploying, scaling and monitoring machine learning models on Kubernetes.
